Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 14 (dexterity; untrained) Class DC: Champion: 36
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Armor Expertise: Armor Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor; Heavy Armor; Unarmored Defense)

Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Armor Expertise: May use the specialization effects of medium and heavy armor
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to Strike a foe that uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square while moving
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Quick Shield Block: May use an additional Reaction for a Shield Block 1/tn
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Shield Warden: May use Shield Block to protect an adjacent ally
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapons
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +30 (dexterity; master); Will: +31 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Juggernaut: Save Master (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Juggernaut: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
